TextView.android:text: Full-day Boat and Snorkeling Trip with Dolphins

On this full-day snorkelling tour, you'll hop on a boat and stop at various spots off the shores of Hurghada. As you snorkel among the underwater islands with coral reefs, you'll have the chance to greet the likes of clownfish, lionfish, manta rays, hammerhead sharks, turtles and whale sharks. A buffet lunch will be served on the boat. At the Dolphin House, a dive and snorkelling site where dolphins gather, you'll be able to see dolphins swimming in the open water and participate in a 20-minute water sport. Read less
